Bash("./venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "
with open\(''inventory/serializers.py'', ''rb''\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Remove the corrupted byte sequence
corrupted = b''\\xc3\\x83\\xc6\\x92\\xc3\\x82\\xc2\\xa2\\xc3\\x83\\xc2\\xa2\\xc3\\xa2\\xe2\\x80\\x9a\\xc2\\xac\\xc3\\x82\\xc2\\xa0\\xc3\\x83\\xe2\\x80\\x9a\\xc3\\x82\\xc2\\x90 ''
content = content.replace\(corrupted, b''''\)

with open\(''inventory/serializers.py'', ''wb''\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)
print\(''Fixed corrupted bytes''\)
")

from django.contrib.auth.models import User

user = User.objects.get\(username=''khan''\)
print\(''Has initiate_inspectioncertificate:'', user.has_perm\(''inventory.initiate_inspectioncertificate''\)\)
print\(''User permissions:'', list\(user.user_permissions.values_list\(''codename'', flat=True\)\)\)
print\(''Groups:'', list\(user.groups.values_list\(''name'', flat=True\)\)\)
")

Bash("C:/Users/Insha Khan/ams_v3_user/venv/Scripts/python.exe" "C:/Users/Insha Khan/ams_v3_user/manage.py" shell -c "
from django.contrib.auth.models import User
from inventory.models import Location

user = User.objects.get\(username=''khan''\)
profile = user.profile

print\(''=== User khan ===''\)
print\(''Assigned locations:'', list\(profile.assigned_locations.values_list\(''name'', ''is_store'', ''is_standalone''\)\)\)

accessible = profile.get_accessible_locations\(\)
print\(''All accessible:'', list\(accessible.values_list\(''name'', ''is_store'', ''is_standalone''\)\)\)

standalone = accessible.filter\(is_standalone=True\)
print\(''Standalone only:'', list\(standalone.values_list\(''name'', flat=True\)\)\)

# Check location hierarchy
print\(\)
print\(''=== Location hierarchy ===''\)
csit = Location.objects.filter\(name=''CSIT''\).first\(\)
if csit:
    print\(f''CSIT parent: {csit.parent_location}''\)
    print\(f''CSIT is_standalone: {csit.is_standalone}''\)
    
main_uni = Location.objects.filter\(name__icontains=''main uni''\).first\(\)
if main_uni:
    print\(f''Main Uni: {main_uni.name}, is_standalone: {main_uni.is_standalone}, parent: {main_uni.parent_location}''\)
")
